name: Tomb Raider - Miko
text: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Raiding Tool" card in your GY; Equip that target to this card. You can send up to 2 cards equipped to this card to the GY; Equip "Raiding Tool" cards with different names from your Deck to monsters you control equal to the amount sent. You can only use this effect of "Tomb Raider - Miko" once per turn.
